Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message:
I have fixed this problem in a MacBook Pro before with Dukes help and now have the same issue, but in an iMac. So on the basis that it is an Apple computer, which it obviously is, then can the same thing be done with reprogramming the bios chip?
Thanks

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message: Read BIOS dump and link me.

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message: What is the name of the component I don't have the schematic yet.

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message:
[QUOTE="leonattpcs, post: 17517"]What is the name of the component I don't have the schematic yet.[/QUOTE]

What's the iMac SN or MLB?

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message: There is only 1 chip that looks like a SPI ROM. No schematic needed, just take the effort to look.

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message: Message understood, the sn is C02h5f41dhjf.

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message:
Here, remember do a PRAM reset on first boot and do a fresh install of OS....

[URL]https://www.4shared.com/rar/tlSs5Rt8ca/imacunl.html?[/URL]

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message: HI, thanks for the file. I will get it sorted then update the thread.

threads.title: [SOLVED]iMac 22 inch padlock symbol on screen
threads.message:
Hey,
That got it, and it is working again. All good.
Thanks again.
